name: FastlyWrite UserBot
description: A Telegram Which helps you to score more in fastlywritebot

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: A list of authorized chats. (Separate with space) If you want to use bot in all chat, leave this empty.

TESTERS.description: A list of testers. Separate with space.
